text: UNIVERSITY EXAMINATIONS UNIVERSITEITSEKSAMENS UNISAI== e CcOos3721 Qctaber/November 2018 Operating Systems and Architecture Duration 2 Hours 70 Marks EXAMINATION PANEL AS APPOINTED BY THE DEPARTMENT Closed book examination This examination question paper remains the property of the University of South Africa and may not be removed from the examination venue This paper consists of 5 pages Instructions. 1 Answer all the five (5) questions in your answer book 2 All rough work must be done 1n your answer book 3 Please answer the questions 1 order If you want to do a question later, leave a blank space 4 The stnng SGG (Silberschatz, Galvin & Gagne) refers to the prescribed book, namely, Operating Systems Concepts, 9" ediuon for this module Good luck!
